name: Mortar pit
description: You are in a sandy mortar pit, you have a radio.

name: Firing point
description: You hoof your way to the firing point, the equipment is no longer there except for a broken-mortar-tube, and Private-Snuffy.

name: Vehicle yard
description: you are in the Vehicle yard, there is various vehicles around and your mortar-tube

name: Ammo depot
description: You are in the ammo depot, there is ammo for the mortar tube here and cheese-charges

name: Range
description: you are at the Range, there is your mortar base-plate

name: Quarters
description: you are in the Quarters, inside is Specialist-Sham, and a collection of CopenHagen-Wintergreen

name: Chow hall
description: you are in the Chow hall, there are scattered chairs and tables, as well as Cookie the cook

name: TOC
description: you stumble in and crash through the tent flaps of the TOC, there is an Angry-csm
